node.name: Tasktop Pro
node.shortdescription:
Tasktop Pro is the enterprise-ready product built on Eclipse Mylyn with more connectors and advanced productivity features. Tasktop provides integrated access to more than 50 issue, defect and project management systems from within a personal task list in Eclipse.

The task-focused interface monitors your programming activity to create a “task context” that focuses your workspace on only the relevant code for the task at hand. This enables one-click multitasking and interruption recovery and results in dramatic productivity gains.



Tasktop Certified Connectors

Mylyn Tasktop Pro Tasktop Enterprise
Bugzilla VersionOne HP Quality Center and ALM
JIRA ThoughtWorks IBM Rational Team Concert
Mantis ScrumWorks Pro Microsoft Team Foundation Server
Trac Outlook IBM Rational ClearQuest
Rally Google Apps Plus all of Pro
TeamForge Firefox
Perforce Plus all of Mylyn



Tasktop Pro Productivity Features

Time Tracking - Save time by automatically tracking time spent on each task. Time can be reported and adjusted as needed before uploading to the server.
Cross-repository Interoperability - Use multiple defect and project management systems side by side. Tasktop Pro provides faciliteis to create and navigate relationships between artifacts on different servers and move items from one system to another.
Focused Web Browsing & Documents - Web pages and local documents are automatically captured in the context of the relevant task so there's no need to bookmark or remember where you save documents.
Email Integration - Send email messages to your task list in Eclipse so you can track them as to do items while capturing context and tracking time spent.
Integrated Tutorials - Take a step by step tour from the basics to advanced productivity features as you configure Tasktop and begin working task-focused.




Screenshots

Task list and embedded task-focused web browser


Time tracking reports and charts


View the feature matrix

Try Tasktop Pro free for 30 days

Contact Tasktop Technologies
